name: Birds Eye 4 Large Cod Fillets Harry Ramsden Batter 480G
description: Prefried cod portions formed from pieces of cod fillet, coated in crispy batter.
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Number_Of_Uses>4 This pack contains 4 portions</Number_Of_Uses><Cooking_Guidelines>Oven cook (From Frozen): Tastiest when Oven Baked Straight from the Freezer.220°C, Fan 200°C, Gas Mark 7 25 mins.Pre-heat oven.Cook in the middle of the oven on a baking tray, until crisp and golden.Please ensure food is cooked until piping hot.These instructions are guidelines only.Do Not refreeze after defrosting.</Cooking_Guidelines></Cooking_Instructions>
ingredients: # E450 and E500 are the basic ingredients of Baking Powder, which is used to make the batter light and crispy
PromotionDescription: £1 off when you buy any New Birds Eye Stir Your Senses meal
